isis.stitle: 7.3 Liter Diesel Engine Service (1991) - INJECTION PUMP, NOZZLES, FUEL FILTER, SUPPLY PUMP AND GLOW PLUGS - Removing Injection Pump (all applications)

svcproc.title: INJECTION PUMP AND CAMSHAFT GEARS
svcproc.para: Injection pump and camshaft gears have a "Y" stamped on the face of the gears for alignment. In addition to the "Y", the gear teeth adjacent to the "Y" on the camshaft gear are permanently dyed.

note.para: The "Y" marks are not easily visible with the front cover on the engine. For ease of assembly, draw a reference line up from the "Y" mark on the gear, prior to removing the gear.
The following is necessary only if the injection pump drive gear is replaced.
